## Plane.(constructor)

Construct a plane by copying another plane

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(other: Plane);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | [Plane](doc/markdown/./base.plane.md) | The plane to be copied from. |
